kaleidoscope

Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • kaleidoscope.Shape
      • kaleidoscope.Ball

  • public class Ball
extends Shape
    Ball extends Shape. It does not overwrite any methods, but allows the View to determine when it should draw the Shape with fillOval.
    Author:
    Ryan Smith, Nicki Hoffman
